"I'm hurt... but I'll be fine -I think... " Nightlight couldn't 
continue she put her left hand in her right shoulder and she did a 
painful gesture.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> OOC: Hey!  I've cut myself with a butter knife.  They only look 
dull so they 
> hurt you when you aren't looking.
> 
> ::Aerotaur::
>     He watches Clash leave.  When he's gone Aerotaur runs over to 
Nightlight. 
>  "Are you okay?"
